frontmatter.title: Interfaces and Reflections In Go
frontmatter.description: This post talks about how interfaces work internally in Go and simplifies the concept of Reflection which is needlessly compicated with over the top analogies in the official Go Blog Post on the Laws of Reflection

frontmatter.title: The LFX Experience
frontmatter.description: I was selected for an internship at Linux Foundation Program to work on Vitess, an open source database clustering solution. After application I realized how little do I know about the internship work
